en.title: How it starts
en.subtitle: A simple way to
en.description: We make it easier to you to help other muslim brothers in Nigeria, wherever you are, which will maks you achieve a greater sense of satisfaction and growth as it feels good to help others and provide them with all the essential resources, especially from an islamic point of view.
